name: Halo 3 Legendary Map Pack
description:
Halo 3 Legendary Map Pack is an action-shooter game developed by Bungie Software. It came out on 15-04-2008. Microsoft Game Studios published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Halo 3 Legendary Map Pack on Xbox 360.
Martin O'Donnell and Michael Salvatori scored the game.
